name: .DJVUS File Extension
summary: Learn about .DJVUS files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: DJVUS files are encrypted and cannot be opened. To decrypt your DJVUS files and return them to their pre-infected state, you can use Emsisoft Decryptor for STOP Djvu. The decryptor's website includes detailed instructions for decrypting DJVUS files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
